title: ExpandSuspect
description: Detailed expansion of a single suspect profile

role.description: Role or relationship to case/victim (must match Plan exactly)

background.description: Detailed background: occupation, history, personality traits, relevant past events

motive.description: Detailed potential motive for involvement in the case

alibi.description: Detailed alibi with specific times, locations, and corroborating factors

demeanor.description: General demeanor during investigation (nervous, calm, evasive, helpful, etc.)

inconsistencies.description: Notable inconsistencies in their statements or behavior

relationships.description: Relationships to other suspects, witnesses, or victim

personId.description: ID of related person (S001 for suspect, W001 for witness)

relationship.description: Type of relationship (colleague, friend, enemy, family, etc.)

nature.description: Nature of the relationship and its relevance to the case

evidenceLinks.description: Evidence items that potentially connect to this suspect

evidenceRef.description: Reference to evidence (will be defined in PlanEvidence)

connection.description: How this evidence connects to the suspect

suspicionLevel.description: Initial suspicion level based on available information
